algorithm

Class Shor

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithm.Shor

  • public class Shor
extends java.lang.Object
    Shor's Algorithm implementation. Still a work in progress and so comments are left in as a guide to thought-process

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Shor() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Matrix actOnRegister(Register r, int N)
      Calculates the hadamard transform of every qubit in the first register, leaving the second register unaffected.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Test method for Shor's algorithm, for chosen 'random' value to be 3 and N = 15
      static Matrix projection(Register r, int N)
      Creates a matrix that is the tensor of two registers, and which will take a random orthonormal projection of the first register leaving the second unaffected.

        public static Matrix projection(Register r,
                int N)
        Creates a matrix that is the tensor of two registers, and which will take a random orthonormal projection of the first register leaving the second unaffected.
        Parameters:
        r - is the resultant matrix of two registers tensored together
        N - is the number being factorised
